Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2023 (Sophomore): Started in 51 of 52 appearances … Batted .304/.485/.591 with 44 RBIs and 13 home runs … Led team with 20 stolen bases on 23 attempts … Set career high eight RBIs facing Southern (4/4) … Tallied a .970 fielding percentage.

2022 (Freshman): Appeared in 40 games with 32 starts ... Batted .227 with five doubles, four triples, three home runs, 19 RBIs, 21 runs scored and 11 stolen bases ... Hit .270 with one double, three triples, one home run, five RBIs, 13 runs scored and six stolen bases in 19 Sun Belt Conference games, 12 of which were starts ... Posted a .438 on-base percentage in SBC contests ... Recorded five multiple-hit and three multi-RBI games ... Finished with a career-high four RBIs against Middle Tennessee (March 5), which included his first collegiate home run.

High School: Lettered four years in baseball and football at Vestavia Hills HS ... Batted .402 with six doubles, six triples, five home runs, 30 RBIs, 28 runs scored, 22 stolen bases and .492 on-base percentage in 31 games as a senior in 2021 ... Also went 2-0 on the mound with three saves.

Personal: Full name is Patrick Joseph Sullivan III ... Born July 1, 2002, in Mountain Brook, Ala. ... The second of four children to Patrick and Claudia Sullivan ... Grandfather, Pat Sullivan, won the 1971 Heisman Trophy at Auburn, and played five seasons in the NFL with the Atlanta Falcons, Washington Redskins and San Francisco 49ers ... Father, Patrick, played football at Auburn and TCU ... Majoring in Biomedical Sciences.
